name: Pacmanx10
description:
Pacmanx10 is Pacman's son, and is now a playable character with a twist!

Instead of eating dots, pacmanx10 eats binary digits, which will be the earned score!
How does it work? I'm glad you asked!
After eating a digit, a timer of 1 second is activated.
When eating any other digit, it adds to a chain of all the digits he ate.
When the timer is off, the chain (of the digits he ate) will be added to his score!
For Example: If pacmanx10 eats "1", then "0", then "0", and then eats nothing for a whole second - the score will rise by 4, because 100 in binary is 4!
NOTE - the  chain is limited to 16 digits, therefore 2^16 - 1 is the highest score that can be achieved at once!

The rest of the rules are simple as the original; you move with the arrows, must eat all the dots / binary digits, and must avoid contact with the ghosts - unless you eat a powerup that allows you to eat ghosts!

The menu is controlled using the mouse.
The game has 2 modes:

  • "Classic", where you play as the original Pacman
  • "Modern", where you play as Pacmanx10 with the gameplay twist.

The first 5 levels are tutorial levels, you can skip them in the menu.
Also, you can press "p" anytime in the game in order to pause (and resume).

Best played with volume up, lots of emphasis on fun sound effects!
The game is over when you lose 3 lives.
Good luck!!
